dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 8 Infringements
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
Articleinsider.com
 
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc. 
[private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private] Fax: [private]
Attn: [private] at [private]@infosearchmedia.com
 
Incident#1
1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the article "What to Look for in Glamour Model Photographers" by Staff Writer posted on the Article Insider web site at http://photography.articleinsider.com179438_glamour_model photographers.html
2.	Search Query: "If you're trying to break into the industry, the first thing you need to do is find a reliable resource for glamour model photographers."
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.vividere.com/glamour_model photographers.htm
3.	My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
4.	Email of infringing website: N/A
5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6. 	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
7.	Signature
8. Fax to: [private]
 
Incident#2
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Be Responsible with Credit" by James Lyons posted on the Article Insider web site at http://credit.articleinsider.com/232055_credit_history reports.html
2.	Search Query: "Credit card companies prey on kids coming out of high school." Infringing Web Pages: http://www.finance-kings.com/info/credit/05-credit-history-reports.shtml
3.	My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
4.	Email of infringing website: N/A

7.	Signature
8.	Fax to: [private]
